DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is 1. to determine the recommended dose of everolimus for a subsequent Phase II trial 2. to determine the efficacy of everolimus plus DHAP
DOC.brief_title: Everolimus in Combination With DHAP in Patients With Relapsed or Refractory Hodgkin Lymphoma
DOC.criteria: relapsed or refractory Hodgkin Lymphoma age 1860 histology confirmed relapse previous therapy with mTOR inhibitor current CNS involvement other primary malignant disease within the last 3 years
